Job Title: Product Designer

Location: Los Angeles, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Are you a world-class Product Designer passionate about revolutionizing the way companies approach and manage their culture? Instill is seeking a Product Designer to join our team in building the world’s first Culture Operating System™ that leverages the best of AI to build a stronger culture, better teams, and exceptional performance - faster.

As a Product Designer at Instill, you'll work with the world's foremost experts in neuroscience, organizational psychology, psychometrics, and predictive analytics to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces and experiences for our Culture Operating System™. You'll play a critical role in helping our clients create a digitized system of record for their organizational values, measure their culture and receive real-time action steps and interventions to optimize their team’s performance.

At Instill, you'll be part of a team changing the game for companies around the world. Our work is mission critical and has the potential to significantly impact not only a company's bottom line but also its employees' wellbeing. In fact, 90% of CEOs and CFOs believe that improving company culture increases their value, but only 16% believe their culture is where it should be today.

With Instill, you'll have the opportunity to help close this gap and deliver real results to one of the most substantial problems of 2024. So, are you ready to join the culture revolution? If you're passionate about designing fantastic user experiences, love working with data and technology, and have a deep interest in company culture, let’s connect!

Responsibilities

Conduct in-depth user research and testing to derive insights that inform design decisions, ensuring that the user experience is intuitive and efficient. Create visually stunning and high-quality user interfaces and experiences through thoughtful design and prototyping, elevating the overall usability of our product. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product management, development teams, sales, and executive leadership to ensure a seamless end-to-end user experience. Guarantee a consistent user experience across various platforms and devices, adhering to design systems, style guides, and pattern libraries. Stay up-to-date of the latest design trends, technologies, and tools to continuously enhance our product's design capabilities. Develop and maintain design systems, style guides, and pattern libraries to ensure consistency and efficiency in design. Facilitate design workshops and presentations to communicate design concepts and gather feedback. Contribute to the design vision and strategy of the company and product, and ensure that design decisions align with the overall goals and objectives. Help grow our first design Team

Requirements

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Product Design, UX, or a related field with 7+ years of experienceA deep and broad design experience with a portfolio demonstrating a deep understanding of human-centered design methodologies. Experience working in a start-up or early-stage environments, with a strong understanding of the unique design challenges and opportunities that come with these fast-paced and constantly evolving environments. Strong skills in storytelling, user research and testing, prototyping, and design tools such as Sketch, Figma, InVision, and Adobe Creative Suite. Excellent communication, collaboration, and presentation skills, with the ability to clearly and effectively communicate design decisions and ideas to cross-functional teams. Experience designing for multiple platforms and devices, with a deep understanding of design systems, style guides, and pattern libraries with strong considerations for responsive design and accessibility. Familiarity with the latest design patterns, technologies, and tools, and a passion for human-centered designStrong problem-solving skills, lateral thinking, and the ability to think creatively. Curiosity and passion towards designing for the future of work to transform organizational cultureA commitment to Instill’s mission of democratizing world-class cultures.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
